def_cn: 受难；(因政治或宗教信仰而)殉道，殉难，殉教
def_en: If someone suffers martyrdom, they are killed or made to suffer greatly because of their religious or political beliefs.

def_cn: (为博取同情或赞赏的)夸大痛苦的行为,装可怜
def_en: If you describe someone's behaviour as martyrdom, you are critical of them because they are exaggerating their suffering in order to gain sympathy or praise.
